alert.note: Alert for St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:14PM EDT until July 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL ST. LAWRENCE COUNTY... At 314 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lisbon to Edwards, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Canton, Norfolk, Oswegatchie, Lisbon, Louisville, De Kalb, Fowler, Colton, Rensselaer Falls, Morley, Degrasse, Norwood, Hermon, Chipman, Heuvelton, Waddington, Richville, Madrid, and Star Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
